rules_text:
When Freyhild Warlord enters the battlefield, create two 2/1 black Warrior snow creature tokens with haste and “this creature can't block,” then traverse Glacia. [i](Planeswalk to Glacia. If you're already there, cause {A}.)[/i]
{1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice two creatures: Return Freyhild Warlord from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
